PyTalk deps
-----------

In this repos, you will find a version of some libraries used by pyTalk.

 - XMPPPy/xmpp : For Jabber client communication
   	 http://xmpppy.sourceforge.net/

   - PyDNS : Used by XMPPPy for Domain Name Translation
     	 http://pydns.sourceforge.net/

 - enum : Use to implements Enum
	http://pypi.python.org/pypi/enum/0.4.3

 - PyQt4 : You can find the last version of PyQt4 on :
   	 http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/pyqt/download.php

 - Qt4	 : You can find the last version of Qt4 on :
   	 http://www.trolltech.com/downloads/opensource#qt-open-source-edition
